title: Strawberry Murder
description: Hi! Book 14 is now available: Raspberry Creme Murder Murder! Copy and paste this URL in your browser to get the next book now! http://amzn.to/1JOl2d6   After the producers of Missy's show bring the production back to LaChance to make her a national television star, a spat erupts between a new employee, Echo and a member of the production crew. When the crew member is found murdered, Echo and her new boyfriend disappear to avoid suspicion. While Chas and Missy race to find clues, it turns out Echo's boyfriend isn't quite what he seems. Is this the case that will finally unravel Missy's sweet dream?
